channel.title: The Iron Ragdoll Image RSS

item.title: sparky cool
item.description:
• Sparky

The letters at the end spells out "sbarki" in Uyghurche! I've only gotten so far as the alphabet and some basic words, haha. I do hope one day I'll be able to actually translate stuff into the language. (Meanwhile, French: You're leaving me behind?? Sorry learning one language hard enough I can't do two at the same time lmao.)
item.creator: Tofutush

item.title: cosmo alaska subway
item.description:
• Cosmo
  • Alaska

I don't draw these that often, so here it is: Cosmo and Alaska on a late-night subway.

Can't be sure if this is canon though. I mean, right now in Hillslope there aren't any subways of course, and I haven't really thought about what they're going to do after leaving Hillslope.
item.creator: Tofutush

item.title: bauhinia police symbol
item.description:
I had so much fun drawing all these bauhinia variations. This is the symbol of the Bauhinian police, or the Public Security Bureau of Bauhinia.

The flower petals are presented as sharp blades, symbolizing the will of the police force in safeguarding the Bauhinian people.
item.creator: Tofutush

item.title: sparky elegance glowbugs
item.description:
• Sparky
  • Elegance

This is some vague plot idea in my head, that Elegance and Sparky got kidnapped and that's what set Sparky on her path as a bodyguard.

The song is , or Glowbugs Fly. I translated the lyrics because I like it and I don't think anyone else ever translated them. I am not a translator and two of my worst school subjects are Chinese and English, so don't yell.
item.creator: Tofutush

item.title: cms friends
item.description:
• Sparky
  • Sky
  • Qibli
  • Firecrackers

Something I drew out of boredom and never bothered to shade.
item.creator: Tofutush

item.title: melody sparky tephra
item.description:
• Melody
  • Sparky
  • Tephra

Tephra, Sparky, and Melody as adults. They all became what's opposite of themselves.

Tephra is a cop, maintainer of law and order, when he used to live a life of crime. Sparky is a bodyguard for Animus, living for other people, guarding the interests of the few. Melody is a private detective, meddling in other people's affairs, when he used to keep to himself and mind only his own business.
item.creator: Tofutush

item.title: sparky zombie
item.description:
• Sparky

To this day I still don't know why I drew this.
item.creator: Tofutush

item.title: bauhinia flag
item.description:
The flag of the Republic of Bauhinia.

In the middle of the flag is a bauhinia flower with leaves behind it, the symbol of the Republic of Bauhinia. The flower grows in the subtropics all throughout Bauhinia and blooms in the winter. It stands for the core Bauhinia values of family, harmony, and love.
item.creator: Tofutush

item.title: fanton flag
item.description: The flag of the Republic of Fanton.
item.creator: Tofutush

item.title: peacock family
item.description:
• Amber
  • Peacock
  • Sparky
  • Willow
  • Fantasy
  • Ironheart

Peacock's family, all mysteriously happy. This is an old drawing; now, Amber never met Ironheart. And Fantasy's necklace should be light blue.
item.creator: Tofutush

item.title: icicle old
item.description:
• Icicle

Icicle was an old character I cut. He was meant to be a co-investigator with Sparky, but I cut him because 1) I have one too many characters, 2) it's better for Sparky to be on her own, and 3) I don't have a reasonable explanation about why they didn't just make Icicle investigate by himself when he first arrived. So, bye, Icicle.
item.creator: Tofutush

item.title: melody old
item.description:
• Melody

This is an old picture, but honestly Melody hasn't changed.
item.creator: Tofutush
